002024.SZ.summary: Suning.com Co., Ltd. engages in the retail business in China. Its stores offer various products, including home appliances, 3C products, and mother-and-baby care products, department store products, home installation products, books, smart home, financial products, etc. The company also sells its products online. In addition, the company offers supply chain finance, consumer finance, and payment services. As of December 31, 2018, the company operated 8881 self-operated stores and 2071 franchised stores in Suning.com. The company was formerly known as Suning Commerce Group Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Suning.com Co., Ltd. in February 2018. Suning.com Co., Ltd. was founded in 1990 and is based in Nanjing, China.

002344.SZ.summary: Haining China Leather Market Co.,Ltd operates professional leather market in China. The company also operates an online mall that offers leather, fur, suede, luggage, and household items; and provides import and export foreign trade and policy support services, as well as supply chain financial solutions. In addition, it develops residential real estate properties; and operates hotels. The company was founded in 1994 and is based in Haining, China.

002403.SZ.summary: Aishida Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, manufacture, and sale of cookware and kitchen electric appliances worldwide. It offers cooking utensils, including pressure cookers, woks, frying pans, soup milk pots, steamers, kettles, kitchen sets and accessories, and other products; home appliances consisting of rice and electric pressure cookers, electric kettles, soymilk machines, electric baking pans, induction cookers, multifunctional cooking machines, and juice and bread machines; and environmental appliances, such as filters. The company was formerly known as Zhejiang Aishida Electric Co., Ltd and changed its name to Aishida Co., Ltd. in November 2019. Aishida Co., Ltd. was founded in 1987 and is based in Wenling, the People's Republic of China.

002416.SZ.summary: Shenzhen Aisidi Co., Ltd. provides supply chain services in China and internationally. It operates through four business segments: Intelligent Terminal Products, Communication Service, Financial Service, and E-Commerce Platform. The company offers mobile communication terminal products, digital consumer products, communication service, Internet, finance, etc. It also provides cross-border communications, leakage warning, multi-party communication, flow recharge services, etc.; and supply chain financial services, including small loans and trade financing, as well as commercial factoring and cross-border supply chain financing services to upstream and downstream customers. The company offers its services under the U.you brand through its sales groups and service network in 31 provinces across 300 local networks, as well as through approximately 30,000 offline sales outlets; and eÂbusiness platforms. The company was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

002780.SZ.long_name: Beijing Sanfo Outdoor Products Co., Ltd
002780.SZ.summary: Beijing Sanfo Outdoor Products Co., Ltd provides outdoor life products and services in China. It is also involved in the events and camps training activities. The company sells its products through 38 stores in Beijing, Shanghai, Guandong, Jiangsu, Tianjin, Wuxi, Suzhou, Hangzhou, Chongqing, Wuhan, Chengdu, Hebei, Qingdao, Shenyang, and Changchun, as well as online stores. Beijing Sanfo Outdoor Products Co., Ltd was founded in 1997 and is based in Beijing, China.

0493.HK.summary: GOME Retail Holdings Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the retail of home appliances and consumer electronic products in the People's Republic of China. The company is also involved in the provision of logistics and procurement, storage and delivery, IT development, and business management services; retailing of mobile phones and accessories; and online retail of electrical appliances and consumer electronic products, as well as in property holding activities. In addition, it engages in the trading of wine products. As of December 31, 2019, it operated 2,602 stores in 776 cities. The company was formerly known as GOME Electrical Appliances Holding Limited and changed its name to GOME Retail Holdings Limited in 2017. GOME Retail Holdings Limited was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Beijing, the People's Republic of China.

0814.HK.summary: Beijing Jingkelong Company Limited engages in the retail and wholesale distribution of daily consumer products in the People's Republic of China. The company operates in three segments: Retailing, Wholesaling, and Others. It is involved in the operation of hypermarkets, supermarkets, convenience stores, and department stores. The company offers food products, untagged food products, daily necessities, drinks and cigarettes, beverages, hardware products, and household appliances. It also provides plastic packing products; hotel services; and school training services. As of December 31, 2019, the company operated 178 retail outlets. Beijing Jingkelong Company Limited was founded in 1994 and is based in Beijing, the People's Republic of China. Beijing Jingkelong Company Limited is a subsidiary of Beijing Chaoyang Auxiliary Food Company.

1280.HK.summary: Qidian International Co., Ltd., an investment holding company, engages in the retail and bulk distribution sale of household appliances, mobile phones, and computers in the People's Republic of China. It operates through Traditional Business and New Retail Business segments. The company is involved in the bulk distribution of air-conditioners, and imported and general merchandises; and provision of after-sales, installation, and maintenance services for household appliances. It sells its household appliances merchandise by bulk distribution to retailers and distributors. The company also operates a chain of retail stores for selling household appliances, and import and general merchandises. In addition, it sells its products through an online platform. Further, the company provides community, logistics, and warehouse services. The company was formerly known as Huiyin Smart Community Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Qidian International Co., Ltd. in February 2020. Qidian International Co., Ltd. was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Yangzhou, the People's Republic of China.

2122.HK.summary: Kidsland International Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, engages in the trading and sale of toys and infant products in Mainland China and Hong Kong. It offers its products under Lego, Silverlit, BANDAI, FAO Schwarz, MGA, Spin Master, SIKU, Schleich, BRIO, Crayola, LOL, little tikes, NUNA, Aprica, OXO, Discovery, SHARPER IMAGE, TOPModel, NUM NOMS, Dantoy, Poopsie, Sterntaler, Micro, and other brands. As of December 31, 2019, the company operated 774 self-operated retail points of sale, which consists of retail shops and consignment counters; 697 distributors; 16 hypermarket and supermarket chains; 20 online stores; and 5 online key accounts. It also invests in trademarks. Kidsland International Holdings Limited was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.

300622.SZ.summary: Doctorglasses Chain Co., Ltd engages in retail of eyewear in China. The company offers glasses under the President optical, Dr. glasses zÃ¨le, and artificial stone brand names. It operates 318 chain stores, including 304 direct stores and 14 franchised stores. The company was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

300736.SZ.summary: BYBON Group Company Limited provides mobile phone aftersales services. The company operates through Mobile Phone Maintenance; Commercial Product Sales, Value-Added Services and Others; and E-commerce segments. It also sells computers, software and auxiliary equipment, electronic products, hardware, machinery; and power transmission and communications equipment. In addition, the company offers communications equipment maintenance; technology extension, computer systems, and mobile phone repair services; and mobile security, member, testing, value-added, and other related mobile services. Further, it is involved in the sale, certification, and recycling of second-hand mobiles and merchandises. The company serves mobile phone manufacturers, business customers, dealers, cooperation stores, shopping malls, individual consumers, and second-hand mobile phone business customers. It sells its products through stores and e-commerce; and operates through 139 branches. The company was incorporated in 2007 and is based in Beijing, China. BYBON Group Company Limited is a subsidiary of Shanghai Bybon Electronic Technology Co., Ltd.

600826.SS.summary: Shanghai Lansheng Corporation engages in the trade and industry, finance, real estate, and biopharmaceuticals businesses. The company offers footwear products, including sports, leather, canvas, baby, and indoor shoes, as well as slippers and rubber boots; and office supplies, such as typewriters, staplers, staples, punches, numbering machines, mathematical sets, paper clips, office pins, stamps, stamp pads, inks, rulers, artist brushes, and paint tools. It also provides student supplies comprising erasers, pencils, and pencil sharpeners; plastic products that include T-shirt, garbage, roll, seat, shopping, and ton packing bags, as well as PP sheets; and paper and paper products, which comprise playing cards, notebooks, and carbon papers. In addition, the company offers sporting products, including synthetic and mini balls, sporting gloves, golf equipment, and hardware and other products; camping goods, such as tents and sleeping bags; and musical instruments, toys, inflatable items, pet wear, garments, headwear, suitcases, kitchen accessories, flatware, towels, and sunglasses. Further, it provides garden and outdoor equipment; sanitary ware; bathroom and wooden products; cookware; kitchenware and utensils; shelving units and working tables; giftware; continuous casters, rolling mill equipment, and process line equipment; and canvas, hand, nylon, tapestry, and travel bags, as well as wallets. Additionally, the company offers stationery products; and sporting dresses, and electrical and mechanical goods. Shanghai Lansheng Corporation markets its products under brands, such as FORWARD, HISPO, LANHUA, NIEER, KOFA, ETERNA, PIONEER, SNOWFLAKE, LARK, GREAT WALL, etc. The company was formerly known as Shanghai Stationery & Sporting Goods Import & Export Corporation. Shanghai Lansheng Corporation was founded in 1983 and is based in Shanghai, China.

603214.SS.summary: Shanghai Aiyingshi Co.,Ltd provides maternal and child products in China. The company's products include infant dairy products, feeding supplies, toiletries, cotton textiles, paper products, toys, lathes, and other products. As of September 30, 2020, it operated 282 direct stores in Shanghai, Jiangsu, Zhejiang, Fujian, Chongqing, and Shenzhen. The company also sells its products through an online platform. Shanghai Aiyingshi Co.,Ltd was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.

603353.SS.summary: Hunan Heshun Petroleum Co., Ltd. engages in the wholesale and retail of gasoline and diesel in China. It is also involved in the gas station and convenience store operation, refined oil storage, and refined oil logistics and distribution activities, as well as investment and construction of gas stations and oil depots. The company was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Changsha, China.

BQ.summary: Boqii Holding Limited operates a pet-focused platform in the People's Republic of China. The company offers food, treats, shampoos, cages, toys, apparel, OTC veterinary drugs, and other pet products to pet parents, and small and medium pet businesses through e-commerce platforms and offline distribution network. It also operates Boqii Community, an interactive content platform; and provides online marketing and information services. The company was founded in 2008 and is headquartered in Shanghai, the People's Republic of China.

CKS2.F.summary: GOME Retail Holdings Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the retail of home appliances and consumer electronic products in the People's Republic of China. The company is also involved in the provision of logistics and procurement, storage and delivery, IT development, and business management services; retailing of mobile phones and accessories; and online retail of electrical appliances and consumer electronic products, as well as in property holding activities. In addition, it engages in the trading of wine products. As of December 31, 2019, it operated 2,602 stores in 776 cities. The company was formerly known as GOME Electrical Appliances Holding Limited and changed its name to GOME Retail Holdings Limited in 2017. GOME Retail Holdings Limited was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Beijing, the People's Republic of China.

CKS2.SG.summary: GOME Retail Holdings Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the retail of home appliances and consumer electronic products in the People's Republic of China. The company is also involved in the provision of logistics and procurement, storage and delivery, IT development, and business management services; retailing of mobile phones and accessories; and online retail of electrical appliances and consumer electronic products, as well as in property holding activities. In addition, it engages in the trading of wine products. As of December 31, 2019, it operated 2,602 stores in 776 cities. The company was formerly known as GOME Electrical Appliances Holding Limited and changed its name to GOME Retail Holdings Limited in 2017. GOME Retail Holdings Limited was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Beijing, the People's Republic of China.

ECXJ.summary: CXJ Group Co., Limited engages in the trading of automobile exhaust cleaners and auto parts in China. The company also offers auto detailing store consultancy services; and authorization services for operating auto detailing stores under the Chejiangling/Teenage Hero Car brand name. The company was formerly known as Global Entertainment Corp. and changed its name to CXJ Group Co., Limited in 2019. CXJ Group Co., Limited was incorporated in 1998 and is based in Hangzhou, China.

FVTI.summary: Fortune Valley Treasures, Inc., through its subsidiaries, engages in the wholesale distribution and retail sale of wine and distilled liquors in the People's Republic of China. The company offers dry red, dry white, rose, and sweet wine. It also operates a store in Dongguan City. The company sells its products primarily to retailers, such as wine shops, convenient stores, and supermarkets. Fortune Valley Treasures, Inc. was incorporated in 2014 and is based in Dongguan, the People's Republic of China.

G2M.F.summary: Beijing Jingkelong Company Limited engages in the retail and wholesale distribution of daily consumer products in the People's Republic of China. The company operates in three segments: Retailing, Wholesaling, and Others. It is involved in the operation of hypermarkets, supermarkets, convenience stores, and department stores. The company offers food products, untagged food products, daily necessities, drinks and cigarettes, beverages, hardware products, and household appliances. It also provides plastic packing products; hotel services; and school training services. As of December 31, 2019, the company operated 178 retail outlets. Beijing Jingkelong Company Limited was founded in 1994 and is based in Beijing, the People's Republic of China. Beijing Jingkelong Company Limited is a subsidiary of Beijing Chaoyang Auxiliary Food Company.

MNSO.summary: MINISO Group Holding Limited, an investment holding company, engages in the retail and wholesale of lifestyle products in China, Asia, the Americas, and Europe. The company offers products in various categories, including home decor products, small electronics, textiles, accessories, beauty tools, toys, cosmetics, personal care products, snacks, fragrances and perfumes, and stationeries and gifts under the MINISO and WonderLife brand names. As of June 30, 2020, it operated a network of approximately 4,200 MINISO stores, as well as online sales channels. The company was founded in 2013 and is based in Guangzhou, China.

YSG.summary: Yatsen Holding Limited engages in the development and sale of beauty products under the brands of Perfect Diary, Little Ondine, and Abby's Choice in the People's Republic of China. The company offers color cosmetics, eye makeup, lip makeup, face makeup, skincare, and nail products; makeup tools and accessories, including brush sets, cotton cosmetic pads, mirrors, and makeup sponges; kits; and other products, such as perfumes and cross-over products, including beauty devices and colored contact lenses. The company sells its products through stores and online channel. The company was formerly known as Mangrove Bay Ecommerce Holding (Cayman) and changed its name to Yatsen Holding Limited in January 2019. Yatsen Holding Limited was founded in 2016 and is headquartered in Guangzhou, China.
